Package org.yourcompany.yourproject.Frontend

Class Board

java.lang.Object
org.yourcompany.yourproject.Frontend.Board
public class Board extends Object
Controller for managing canvas interactions. Handles gate selection, dragging, connections, inputs, and outputs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Board(JPanel canvas, BoardHelper viewService)
    Creates a new Board controller for managing canvas interactions.

      viewService - The BoardHelper service for view management

    • setCurrentCircuit

      Sets the current circuit and loads it to the view.
      Parameters:
      circuit - The circuit to set as current

    • getCurrentCircuit

      public Circuit getCurrentCircuit()
      Gets the currently active circuit.
      Returns:
      The current circuit, or null if none is set

    • repaintCircuit

      public void repaintCircuit()
      Repaint the circuit panel to refresh visual display This method is called by CircuitInspector to update LED states

    • addGate

      public boolean addGate(GateComponent gate, int x, int y)
      Adds a gate to the current circuit at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      gate - The gate component to add
      x - The x-coordinate position
      y - The y-coordinate position
      Returns:
      true if the gate was successfully added, false otherwise

    • removeGate

      public void removeGate(DrawGates gateView)
      Removes a gate from the current circuit.
      Parameters:
      gateView - The gate view component to remove

    • setGateInput

      public void setGateInput(GateComponent gate, int inputIndex, boolean value)
      Sets the input value for a gate and propagates signals.
      Parameters:
      gate - The gate component
      inputIndex - The input port index
      value - The boolean value to set

    • getGateOutput

      public boolean getGateOutput(GateComponent gate, int outputIndex)
      Gets the output value from a gate.
      Parameters:
      gate - The gate component
      outputIndex - The output port index
      Returns:
      The output value, or false if gate is null

    • clearCanvas

      public void clearCanvas()
      Clears the canvas and removes all components from the current circuit.

      Gets the currently selected gate view.
